author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Take care of Carl's comment for PR #36648. The comment is to move the file "pixfwd.xml" in something like "data/pixfwd/2021/v1/pixfwd.xml" which is done here.

#### PR validation:

Tested using workflows in the directory Geometry/ForwardCommonData/test

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-gex110X Take care of Carl's comment for PR #36648
